review_text: This setting is truly stunning ‚Äî you‚Äôre tucked in a private but easy to find/centrally located area, and everywhere you turn are massive saguaros, views of the mountain, and wildlife (a particular highlight was a herd of javelinas, including some tiny piglets meandering past the cabin. Joe was incredibly responsive even while hiking in a remote area himself, as well as the local property manager who were both gracious and prompt. Our last night we discovered the sweet little seating area behind the cabin ‚Äî a perfect place for a stunning sunset!
it was perfect for our quick weekend get away!

Words cannot adequately describe the peaceful surroundings that await you at this cabin. It's set in the Tucson Mountains with serene desert in all directions. Listening to birds and other wildlife provided natures music. You'll come to anticipate the woodpecker who visits each morning!
The cabin was cozy, clean, and peaceful. There is a main house up the driveway but you will not likely see or hear anyone. There is a lovely pool just steps away from the cabin with comfortable seating and an umbrella to shield the sun. We sat outside and listened to birds, saw a javelina, a fox, bunnies, and thoroughly enjoyed the picturesque sunrises and sunsets. Every view is a postcard at Joe's place. Tons of trails to hike and mountain bike nearby. Joe very responsive-a wonderful host.
Only bad part was leaving.

I have stayed at alot of places but this cabin was absolutely amazing. It felt like you were out in the middle of nowhere but close enough to hit the town for restaurants, grocery shopping and other entertainment. I wish I could have stayed longer but this will be my go to place from no on when in the Tucson area. Also my wife was a little leary about staying outside of town but she feel in love with this cabin. She wants to go back and can't wait for the next time.
Definitely recommend!!!!!
a really special place that clearly has the heart and soul of new and old artists. so peaceful, so unique. you can't go wrong and the value is incredible.
It was a very quiet place and the host was so helpful üôè

Joe‚Äôs place was probably the best airbnb I‚Äôve ever stayed in. I am a teacher who wanted nothing more than a quiet spring break where I could enjoy nature and not talk to anyone :) This spot could not have been more perfect for my needs. I trekked all over Tucson for various hikes and every time I came back to the neighborhood I felt like I picked the perfect place. The location was gorgeous and so, so quiet. I felt perfectly safe as a solo female traveler and even though I never saw anyone who lived in the larger house (which was honestly great considering I was seeking solitude) it was nice knowing that there were friendly people so close. The interior looks as exactly as pictured, and the exterior, primarily the private viewing patio and the pool, greatly exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend following the walking directions in the binder to the sweet water preserve and watching the sunset at Gaye‚Äôs pass. I can‚Äôt wait to recommend this place to friends and hopefully return.

We loved the cabin and the area is beautiful with lots to do! Unfortunately, we got bad weather and weren‚Äôt able to take advantage of the hiking & biking trails. We did, however enjoy downtown for dining & drinks.
We definitely want to visit again!

Could not have picked a better Cozy Cabin to Stay at for my 1st visit to Tucson. Joe‚Äôs Cabin is close/borders Tucson Mountain & Saguaro National Parks and is in a park like setting. Joe is a great host and plan to stay here again.
Great location, you are in the middle of the beautiful desert in a quaint cabin with quail and rabbits frequenting the property. Joe is great at responding to any questions you have.

Joe's cabin was a wonderful stay, with lots of comfy accommodations and plenty of room for two people! If we wanted to, we could be entirely self sufficient with a lovely little kitchen and washer and dryer set. There are lots of critters all around the property , but they were lovely to enjoy. There's plenty of space for relaxing outdoors on the property, and the lack of traffic noise made every night almost silent. The stars were beautiful to view.

My roommate and I stayed here for a week for spring break and had the most amazing time. Pictures are identical to what you get but nothing could prepare us for the views around the property- actual magic as two people who had never been to AZ before. With this, Joe gave us great trail recommendations for our hike and was consistently responsive for all our inquiries or needs. Super easy to get into town with ubers but we stayed on/around the property mostly as it was so beautiful. We didn‚Äôt wanna leave it was everything we could‚Äôve asked for and more for our first desert vacation!
Great little cabin

We enjoyed the historic yet updated cabin with it's simple and pleasant decor. The location and grounds are beautiful and quiet, close enough to go to restaurants and hiking within 15-30 minutes. Very helpful to be able to do laundry in the cabin. Comfy bed and plenty of hot water.
We would love to stay here again!
Thanks for a lovely stay!

We really enjoyed our stay in Joe‚Äôs cabin! If you want a quiet getaway near nature, this place is great. We stayed for five nights and explored Saguaro NP and took a day trip to Chiricahua National Monument and Bisbee. The cabin is great but a few things would make it better: a larger coffee pot, a toaster that works, a bigger table, and a bigger hot water heater that provides enough hot water for at least a 7-minute shower. None of these are deal breakers though as the cabin on the whole is great!

Joe and Lenka were wonderful hosts, immediately available if we had questions. The cabin was warm, cozy and had everything we needed.
Sitting around the pool basking in the sun or sitting among the cacti on the backyard chairs looking at the view was a quiet treat. The cabin is on a very walkable road that leads to washes and a hill with a 360 degree view. We were there for a month with no complaints and probably was the nicest air bnb we have been to.
The perfect place for a getaway with my husband. We loved the cabin and the surrounding landscape was absolutely beautiful. It was very quiet and peaceful.
Really beautiful place, serene location. Joe was very accommodating and even offered to bring me an extra blanket on the record cold night. Great stay.

An incredible experience! Perfect for a getaway for two! the cabin was beautiful and cozy. The kitchen and bathroom had everything we needed. we walked in the neighborhood in the evening and it was peaceful and beautiful! Amazing views! We used the chairs Joe has set up to watch the sunset and it was wonderful! After a hike up Wasson Peak we put our legs in the pool even though it was cold for Tucson. It is a great location to explore Saguaro National Park and the Desert Museum, but very close to all of the restaurants we visited. The kitchen was incredibly well supplied and we had a ton of linens and towels. Definitely recommended and we would visit again. Thank you Joe!

The little cabin was perfect. It was close enough to the city but far enough away to make you feel like you were in the desert and mountains. Joe was very friendly and a great host. Enjoyed hiking in the surrounding mountains.
This was a really nice place to stay to check out saguaros. A very cozy cabin, great communication from host, would recommend and would stay again! ü§†üåµ

100% as described. Very detailed instructions. Quaint, peaceful, tranquil accommodations filled with the character and charisma that only a log-cabin can provide. Far enough away to feel the serenity of the area; close enough (a short drive) to access many activities or anything that might be needed. Host seemed responsive; but our stay was uneventful.
The cabin was cozy and had all the modern amenities. It was very peaceful and private!
Was a nice cabin for a good price. Happy with the stay. Do note that the hot tub doesn‚Äôt work ‚Äî the listing is very clear about this but I missed it while skimming :).
We had a wonderful stay at the cabin. Great location with lots of privacy yet not too far from the city. Highly recommend!

This is a unique place we'll always remember. The saguaro rib ceiling is simply beautiful. The kitchen has everything guests need. We made use of the fireplace, our visit in December. Thanks to Joe for everything!
The cabin was comfy and cozy on the inside with everything we needed for a pleasurable stay. The views outside were stunning and made me wish for a longer stay.
This was a really neat cabin in a great setting not too far from town. We would definitely stay here again.
Had a great time at Joe's place in Tucson! Beautiful property among the Saguaros and close to great hikes. Couldn't recommend enough!
Great place! Close to the national park and the city. Saw SO much wildlife!!

Unique cabin in the saguaro forest. Hundred years old, but has all modern adjustments you might need.
Clean, comfortable, convenient.
Private patio is amazing, swimming pool is very nice.
We hope to return one day and stay at least for a week.

We loved staying in the cozy cabin amongst the Saguaros. I don't know about you, but I hardly sleep well when I'm on a trip, but this bed was amazing! The kitchen was just right and well stocked. I highly this place for your next trip to Tucson.

Joe's place is amazing! The views are breathing and the cabin is a one of a kind gem in the desert. I loved it!! It was so quiet and peaceful. The patio was a great added touch to sit and watch the sunrise and sunset everyday. I would love to come back and stay longer.

We absolutely loved this little cabin. It gives you the feel of living out in the desert and the area gives you some of the best views tucson has to offer. It was awesome waking up and being surrounded by saguaros. We will surely love to stay again whenever we are back in town.
Great stay in this cute cabin surrounded by cacti and wildlife.
This place was awesome ! Great place to stay .. peaceful and relaxing ! Everything we needed for a wonderful weekend away !
This was a super cozy cabin. Loved that it was scenic and quiet away from the city! :)
Needed a local getaway, and this was perfect. Loved our stay.
One of a kind cabin, beautiful surroundings and a fist class host!
Amazing cabin get away close to most things in Tucson! Would definitely stay again!
An amazing place to stay. We had a wonderful relaxing trip. Joe's recommendation's for hiking trails were spot on. Love the chairs to watch the sunset and local wildlife.

Joe‚Äôs cabin was the perfect fit for my boyfriend and I during our stay in Tucson! Joe was super flexible during our whole stay and responded very quickly. We would definitely stay here again if we ever come back to the area!
the place is gorgeous, quaint with access to the city, saguaro, and a pool! everything 1 or 2 people need. we even some wildlife roaming around the spot. would stay again!
Such a beautiful cabin in a beautiful location. It is very close to Tucson as well as the saguaro national park. Highly recommend
Great stay! The listing is exactly as described, and Joe was proactive and responsive in his communications. Would stay here again.
Amazing rustic spot in the middle of the desert. Beautiful scenic surroundings with lots of wildlife. Will definitely return

This cabin was a beautiful getaway in the Desert. The location is stunning and very private. The reason that this is 4 stars instead of 5 is that as others have mentioned the Air Conditioning just isn't powerful enough and doesn't cool down the cabin enough to make it comfortable this time of year. Could not have been happier. Joe is an amazing and thoughtful host and the cabin is everything he said it would be. Thank you Joe!
It is. One of the most beautiful and romantic moments with my husband perfect weekend at the beautiful and quiet sunsets that we have spent perfect for romantic anniversaries üíï
Super beautiful location, felt so nice and full of nature. The pool was great, and it‚Äôs a perfect little desert oasis to escape to for a little getaway.

Great place to escape from the heat. The cabin itself is well equipped with everything you'll need and the pool on the property is the perfect to enjoy a hot summer day
Great!

My daughter and I had a wonderful stay. The pool is a true oasis in the desert. The cabin and pool are and beautiful, simple and luxuriously comfortable. We had everything we needed and had a relaxing vacation.
What a special and unique experience! The cabin was very comfortable and cool, even during the heat of the summer. Great to have the pool to relax and cool down in, too.

If you want to escape the city life for a few days and just be one with nature this is the place to go!! The cabin is so cozy and welcoming! The pool was definitely needed after the hot days! Definitely enjoyed my stay!!

This place is incredible! Beautiful little oasis surrounded by saguaros and mountains and all with an amazing pool next to the cabin. Absolutely Perfect! It was exactly as expected and great for nature lovers. We highly recommend this gorgeous cabin!
I‚Äôve told several fellow employees about this place and they plan on booking a date!

Joe's cabin is AMAZING!! It is nestled in such a neat spot in the desert, and the cabin is just absolutely beautiful. So cozy, and Joe was so kind and helpful. We really enjoyed staying here, truly a magical spot.
The view was amazing and would recommend this place highly
This Airbnb is absolutely beautiful! Joe was a wonderful host and was very proactive. The cabin itself is rustic and full of charm. I highly recommend staying here.

What a beautiful location!
Such a gorgeous home, I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. Really cool, historic home, stunning surroundings and about 15 mins away from shops and downtown.
It was far enough out of town to feel private and secluded but close enough for food and shopping.
Swimming in the pool was lovely and I enjoyed all of the string lights at night.
Also super close to the Desert Museum, cool hiking and attractions.
Both hosts were responsive, helpful and easy to communicate with.
Would definitely visit again.
Thanks Joe and Arielle!

Beautiful saguaro desert location. The log cabin was tastefully decorated in a desert-western motif as you can see in the photos. It was clean and well stocked. Very private and safe for a single woman. Hosts communicated well and were very responsive. The bed was comfortable.
The only downside was that it was a little warm (in the middle of the summer). Other than that it was a great find.

Loved my stay at this historic little cottage!

This place is such an amazing find. Surrounded by the Tucson Mountains, yet not too far from the city.

This is a hidden GEM...a lovely place to get away, relax, and reset. This is everything we were looking for and more! The natural surroundings are picturesque. We found the cabin to be cozy, quaint, and quite charming supplied with everything you may need, including games. The pool is gorgeous, private, and inviting. My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay and plan to return soon!!! Joe and Arielle were lovely hosts.
very happy with the place. Felt very warm everything was super clean!

Joe's cabin is one of a kind. The space is beautiful, clean and practical. The kitchen has everything you may need to prepare a meal. The washer and dryer work great and the bathroom is clean, spacious and well-lit.

Terrific hideaway, in an extraordinary setting. Excellent, generous, hosts. For a guesthouse rental with owners on the premises, it doesn't get much more private and special than this.

I've been working a lot lately. I finally had some time off. I really wanted a change in scenery. Well, I didn't have to go far. Joe's place was definitely a home away from home. Pure rest and relaxation and away from the city. Had a good stay perfect for a couples retreat.

Joe‚Äôs cabin was awesome! We really enjoyed ourselves. We were able to see a lot of wildlife, which was really cool. The cabin is the perfect space for two with nice amenities. Great cabin to have a getaway! Would definitely stay again!
Great beautiful place to stay! Joe was a great communicative host!
Beautiful cabin and property! The pool was amazing and a nice place to relax after hiking. Lots of amazing hikes nearby.

We loved our stay at this unique mountain cabin in the desert! If you are wanting to get out of the city limits and immerse yourself in the landscape, this is the place to do it! This cabin was such a unique place surrounded by the Saguaros. Highly recommend!

This was our 2nd stay in the Cozy Cabin and it will not be our last. The location is convenient for our day trips enjoying Arizona's wonders. The Cabin is a treasure surrounded by cactus and amazing desert creatures. The sunsets are National Geographic worthy. Joe is friendly , helpful and very interesting to converse with.

Fantastic cabin right next to the National Park! It‚Äôs the perfect get away cabin in the perfect location for nature lovers. I stayed there for three nights to explore the National Park and Tucson Mountain area and it was the perfect location. This cozy cabin is a must. Highly recommend!
very nice cozy cabin!

Joes cabin is truly a hidden gem! Up in the hills away from everything but a short trip into Tucson for restaurants/entertainment if you so desire. The surrounding area was beautiful- peaceful and walkable.
Joe is an excellent host - checking on needs but not overbearing.
We will certainly put this on our list to come back!!
Sweet oasis in the desert-after all who has a log cabin among saguaro cactus. Very quiet and peaceful. And convenient 15 minutes away from almost everything.

My third stay here‚Äîthat says it all! Looking forward to #4.

We really enjoyed our stay at this lovely setting. Well equipped rental with privacy and lots of nice extras.

This was such a cool place to stay. The location was awesome for everything we wanted to see. Joe was so nice and friendly. The nights were so still and calming. The best was when the coyotes howled at dusk. Would definitely come again!

Joe has a unique place in a beautiful great location. There are chairs set up to enjoy the view. The beautiful and peaceful desert surrounds the rustic guest cottage. There is a pool but it was too cool for swimming. It is possible to take good walks and enjoy the surroundings. Joe is friendly and works as an artist. We really enjoyed staying in the historic home. Great biking and food spots are also relatively close by. Would love to return.

beautiful outdoor area. The cabin was clean, good location, and bed was comfortable. exactly what I was looking for.
heard coyotes at dusk, saw a few rabbits and a couple mule deer in the evening. good location for driving to many trails in the surrounding area.

We spent a wonderful, peaceful week at this rustic getaway. It really does look like the pictures! You're in the desert outside of Tucson with saguaros, javelinas and a billion stars. All that and only a 19 minute drive to the heart of city and the best of Sonoran cuisine. Highly recommended!

Joe‚Äôs place is so great this is our second visit! The well appointed cozy historic cabin with fireplace is very special and unique. The outdoor area and location are just as special. Joe and Arielle were helpful and accommodating. This place is why AIRbnb is still relevant.
Unforgettable!!

The cabin was a cool rustic place to stay. The place has character. The bed was super comfortable and the working fireplace was nice to have on chilly winder evenings. Joe was very responsive and helpful for any questions I had. The location is conveniently close to Tucson Mountain Park and Saguaro National Park which have some great hikes. I would stay again.

We really enjoyed our stay at Joe‚Äôs cabin. There is a cozy sense of place to be had, especially in the evenings when it‚Äôs cold and dark outside. Being nestled into this cute cabin was great after days of hiking and exploring the natural beauty of Tucson. Beautiful setting, cute and cozy cabin with unique character. We loved our stay! Would stay again and recommend it to others. Thank you so much!
Location was lovely and cabin was nice. Had difficulties with the tv but it is good to take a break from technology
We enjoyed our first stay so much that when we had to change our plans due to weather, we were excited to be able to stay for two additional nights.

We would definitely recommend this cabin and would stay again if ever back in the area.
Very unique place to stay!

Had an amazing stay at this beautiful desert cabin-like home. Incredible views of the desert and surrounding mountains, beautiful sunsets every night. A short drive to many great local shops, restaurants and museums.
Great place!
Great place to stay, everything we needed, stocked kitchen & bathroom, responsive hosts plenty of space to roam around cabin, pool and sunset viewing patio. The Pioneer cabin is Awesome!!
This cabin is fantastic! Rustic and in a beautiful location. The hosts were wonderful. We would highly recommend to others!
Historic and cozy cabin! Enjoyed our stay. Would do it again!!!

Comfortable cabin with beautiful nature surrounding it. Super private and peaceful. Bonus: I saw deer and javelinas outside the first morning. Easy drive to trails and museums. Great, responsive hosts ready to help and answer questions. I loved it there!
Staying here is a great way to reboot from the day to day grind. It is so quite and peaceful, and the place is really a trip back in time. Highly recommend!
Fantastic cozy little cabin in a beautiful desert surrounding! We loved staying here, Joe's cabin had everything we needed.
Amazing location!!! The Cabin was so cozy we could‚Äôve spent more time there if we had more time. We loved it!!!!!
My husband and I had a great stay! The location was great and everything we needed was in the cabin! We had an amazing experience and would stay again!
This adorable place is perfect for exploring Tucson and environs! Clean, private, quiet, and so adorable!

Joe's cabin was beautiful and extremely unique! the location was excellent, tucked away right next to the mountains. we saw a pack of deer come right up the driveway, it was pretty cool! it made for a great base camp to see all areas of Tucson. Joe‚Äôs place is a true gem. The location and setting is perfect - I felt like I was on vacation somewhere very remote. The cabin is the cutest - clean and functional, gorgeous views! Hoping to come back soon.

Joe was super quick at responding to my questions, and is obviously a very attentive host. I would absolutely stay here again if I head back down to Tucson area in the future.

A really lovely place to stay as close as you can get to the Saguaro National Park! The cabin was beautifully decorated, clean, with a full kitchen and nice hot shower. Would definitely stay here again.

Historical cabin with the best little private patio steps away for taking in the sky. We didn't use the pool. It was super handy to have a washer/dryer during our lengthy trip away from home. Also, when we needed to extend the stay due to the airline changing our flight, boom, easy. Very kind host. Very cool space.
We had a really good d time at Joe's place. The cabin is cosy and nicely secluded, would definitely recommend if you are in the area visiting.
Joe was a great host‚Äîwe had a clogged shower drain and issue with stove that were immediately fixed. Thank you so much!

Good evening Joe! Maddie and I are jist settling in for the night and we realized we forgot to grab our food out of the fridge. It was one of those "i thought you grabbed it" kinda things.
So sorry about that - we arent the type to leave a mess!
This cabin is a find. Rustic with modern amenities. Serene and a nature lover's dream. We hope to go back again!

Such a great find and experience! Close to the national park, downtown, and museums, but located in a quiet, beautiful neighborhood, Joe‚Äôs cabin is a must stay! Not only we‚Äôre the hosts accommodating with our travel schedules, but their restaurant and excursion recommendations were perfect. Would definitely come back!

What a special place. We weer very intrigued by the local critters. We spent a lot of time wandering around looking for local AZ creatures that are so different than what we have in the pacific northwest.
The location was so perfect. Far enough away from Tucson but close enough to be convenient. The drive to and from was also very nice.

The highlight of our trip and maybe the best AirBNB spot we've stayed at! The place was perfect, very comfortable and had everything we needed and more. Communication was great, and hanging out in a nice swimming pool in the middle of the desert in the morning before a short drive to Saguaro NP had quite an amazing feeling!

Cabin was charming but things do need attention. There was no hot water for the shower,
the Frig.. did not cool. The towels were stored above the shower and necessitated standing on a chair to retrieve.
The TV was hard to tune in.

The cabin was perfect for a weekend getaway from the city life. It was very clean, the pool was amazing, and the hosts were very accommodating and easy to communicate with. I definitely would recommend this for anyone seeking a true western experience!

The log cabin is magical and a walk through time into a space of simplicity. The rustic ambience was so peaceful and the attention to detail was remarkable. Will definitely be back and hopefully for a much longer stay!!!!
Tom and Christine Oyas
We enjoyed every second in the historic cabin. I was a amazing, relaxing weekend getaway. From the private drive way, pool and beautiful sunsets it is definitely a place we will visit again.
We loved staying out amongst the cacti, so beautiful! Quanit cabin, pool, beautiful grounds. Thank you!

This cabin is a dream. I enjoyed three days here relaxing and working. It was quiet, safe, and comfortable.  
The pool was a perfect way to cool off in the heat or after a walk down the road. There are lights where you can swim at night.
The front half of the cabin is cooler where the ac is and the back half is a little warmer but it's not a big deal. Has a kitchen with everything you need.

Thank you for sharing your space! I enjoyed every part of it.

10/10 recommend staying here.
The space felt much larger than the photos could show but was still super cozy. The pool was amazing, the views were stunning and seeing the wildlife around was pretty cool. It was an overall great experience and would stay again.

Joe‚Äôs cabin is probably the best experience we‚Äôve had on Airbnb yet. The place has a ton of charm and the details are amazing, but at the same time it‚Äôs also totally modern and squeaky clean. Location is top notch. If I could give 6 stars, I would!
My second stay there. That says it all! Looking forward to my third.
Perfect retreat right on the edge of the Saguaro National Park. The pool was amazing, perfect temperature in these hot Tucson summers. 10/10 would recommend.
Very beautiful and private.
Lovely place. Our favorite parts were the pool, washer/dryer, and the quiet surroundings. Recommended!
Great location and very clean space. The host was very responsive and accommodating. Definitely recommend staying here.

Nice desert dwelling place cozy enough for the two of us. Beware that you might come across some desert creatures that might make your stay a bit interesting.
